title: Whispers of the Conclave
goal: Introduce the current leadership of the Sages and hint at the internal divisions and weariness plaguing the order.

beats.summary: Lyra presents Kaelen before Grandmaster Elara, the weary but resolute leader of the Sages' Conclave, whose welcome is cautious and tinged with the burdens of her office.
Kaelen observes the Conclave, noting the diminished power and fractured unity compared to the vibrant assembly he remembered, sensing an underlying anxiety.
Valerius, a charismatic and ambitious younger sage, expresses thinly veiled skepticism regarding Kaelen's sudden return and his relevance to current threats.
A tense exchange reveals the ideological chasm between Kaelen's ancient, holistic wisdom and the Conclave's modern, often pragmatic, approach to survival.
